thread.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Never have been calculative as an actor
thread.title_full: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Never have been calculative as an actor - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Never have been calculative as an actor
text:
Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan , who is making a comeback on the silver screen after five years with Sanjay Gupta's "Jazbaa", says she has always chosen her movies based on the script, instead of being "calculative" about it.*Aishwarya Rai Bachchan*
"My attitude as an actor is to respond to a script of a film. I don't ... Â»
